department: Public works and government services ( PSPC)
short_summary: Portable Radio Frequency Spectrum Monitoring Unit
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for one Radio Frequency (RF) Monitoring System capable for use in both domestic and deployed operations.
full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Announcement for Portable Radio Frequency Spectrum Monitoring Unit

**Tender Reference**: WS3810010676-Doc3838066618
**Solicitation Number**: WS3810010676
**Publication Date**: January 22, 2023
**Tender Closing Date**: February 10, 2023, 14:00 EST

The Department of National Defence (DND) of the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a supplier for the procurement of a portable radio frequency spectrum monitoring unit.

**Background**:
The DND requires a Radio Frequency (RF) monitoring system capable for use in both domestic and deployed operations. The RF monitoring system will support the deployment of military units and other operationally deployed units worldwide.

**Procurement Details**:
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: Applies to the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Unspsc Categories**: *43221706 (Radio antennas) *46171625 (Radio communication monitoring system)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding National Capital Region)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2023

**Proposal Submission**:
The proposal should include all required supporting documentation and bid submission, which must be received on February 10, 2023, by 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

**Procurement Information**:
The contracting entity for this procurement is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC). The contact information is:
* **Contact Person**: Kathleen Nimuan, PSPC
* **Contact Email**: kathleen.nimuan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Access to Tender**:
The tender document can be downloaded from the Ariba Discovery website at http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15192648?extsite=MTUxOTI2NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.

### Key Dates
**Publication Date**: January 22, 2023
**Proposal Submission Date**: February 10, 2023, 14:00 EST
**Contract Award**: The contract award will be announced upon completion of the proposal evaluation process.
